name: hoplitelite
description:
hoplitelite

You are player-knight, and you are having a terrible day!

You've been trapped in a room with monsters, doomed to die over and over again...

Unless you clear all 8 levels to escape!

how to play
  • Player-knight can move in any square around him, highlighted in blue.
  • Monsters each have their own movement pattern, hover over (or tap) them to highlight their movement/attack patterns.
  • Monsters are defeated by moving into their square without running into their attack patterns.

This game was created for Ludum Dare 37, and is inspired by hoplite, a wonderful iOS/Android game. Be sure to check it out!

But most importantly,

GOOD LUCK!
